law.catch_line: Posting Of Telephone Number Of The Fire Department Emergency Ambulance Service In Eating Establishments.
law.full_text:
POSTING OF TELEPHONE NUMBER OF THE FIRE DEPARTMENT EMERGENCY AMBULANCE SERVICE IN EATING ESTABLISHMENTS. (Added by No. 148,123, Eff. 4/11/76.)
Every person conducting, operating or managing any restaurant, cafeteria, coffee shop, food stand or other eating establishment where food is sold to be consumed on the premises thereof shall display near each telephone located upon said premises the local telephone number to summon the Fire Department Emergency Ambulance Service for the area involved. Said telephone number shall be set forth as follows:
“EMERGENCY CALLS AMBULANCE (telephone number)”

law.plain_text:
LOS ANGELES MUNICIPAL CODE
POSTING OF TELEPHONE NUMBER OF THE FIRE DEPARTMENT EMERGENCY AMBULANCE SERVICE IN EATING ESTABLISHMENTS. (§ 47.00)
POSTING OF TELEPHONE NUMBER OF THE FIRE DEPARTMENT EMERGENCY AMBULANCE SERVICE IN EATING ESTABLISHMENTS. (Added by No. 148,123, Eff. 4/11/76.)
Every person conducting, operating or managing any restaurant, cafeteria, coffee shop, food stand or other eating establishment where food is sold to be consumed on the premises thereof shall display near each telephone located upon said premises the local telephone number to summon the Fire Department Emergency Ambulance Service for the area involved. Said telephone number shall be set forth as follows:
“EMERGENCY CALLS AMBULANCE (telephone number)”
